name: Austin
description: The year 2194, space station Andromeda, which is in the asteroid belt near Ceres. You play Austin, a new student from Earth who studying at the Central School at the station, his father is the director of the station.During his wanderings around the station, Austin meets a little girl named Ofelia and her mother Adeline accompanies it.During their conversation Ophelia asks Austin to help her, her father Jacob has been missing for over a week, he did not return from his work in the asteroids mining, Austin decides to help her.The search for Jacob leading him to a local bar...
